roleset.name: catch a glimpse
roleset.note: GLIMPSE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'glimpse' based on sentences in brown. (from glimpse.01-v predicate notes)
GLIMPSE-N NOTES: Roleset based on verb entry glimpse.01. (from glimpse.01-n)

example.name: transitive
example.text: At two thirty he sent Fujimoto to the top of the wall at the northeast corner of the mission [*] to keep an eye on the ridge road and give a signal when he first glimpsed the approach of Kayabashi 's party [*T*-1].

example.name: Within LVC
example.text: Well you know and that 's why I 'm I I it helps PRO to have kind of a glimpse into the future right ?
